python_control_orchestrated.notes: Best L2 result — Python optimization orchestrated through toadstool

barracuda_sparsity_l2.notes: First Rust-native attempt — blind SparsitySampler on rough L2 landscape

barracuda_hetero_l2.notes: NMP-aware surrogate + cascade pre-screening + warm-start from L1

barracuda_plain_sparsity_l2.notes: Same-run baseline SparsitySampler for fair comparison

key_findings.nmp_aware_surrogate: Increased pass rate from 0.8% to 8.1% (10x improvement)
key_findings.gap_explanation: Python uses scipy/mystic with more sophisticated optimization and more evals
